incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. Start time : 27/01/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 27/01/2025 12:00 UTC Service impact : Customers may experience latencies during the One Network configuration. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to upgrade multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 28/01/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 28/01/2025 19:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. This may temporarily affect latency. Thank you for your understanding.
